articles.content: People on X are the first to know. Image 3: Opens profile photo. Me: Can you draw a very normal image? ChatGPT: Here is a very normal image depicting a tranquil suburban street scene during the daytime. Someone used 50x leverage to buy $200M of BTC/ETH, a day before the govt announcement. Mere hours before Trump announced it, someone bought $200 million in Ethereum & Bitcoin on 50X LEVERAGE. about some large issues--so worth highlighting that Community Notes seems to me like an incredible smashing home run of a feature. Image 29: Square profile picture. Today we're releasing Claude Opus 4.1, an upgrade to Claude Opus 4 on agentic tasks, real-world coding, and reasoning. Image 30: Bar chart comparing software engineering accuracy between two versions of Opus 4. The first bar shows Opus 4 (May 2025) at 72.5% accuracy and the second bar shows Opus 4.1 (Aug 2025) at 74.5% accuracy. Sign up now to get your own personalized timeline!
